osvSchema.details: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Mini Thread Version 3.33βi. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using Mini Thread Version 3.33βi.

An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using Mini Thread Version 3.33βi.

descriptions.value: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Mini Thread Version 3.33?i. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using Mini Thread Version 3.33?i.

Existe una vulnerabilidad de  Cross-site scripting en Mini Thread versión 3.33?i. Se puede ejecutar un script arbitrario en el navegador web del usuario que accede al sitio web que utiliza el producto. Tenga en cuenta que no se pudo localizar al desarrollador, por lo tanto, los usuarios deberían considerar dejar de usar Mini Thread versión 3.33?i.
